name: Animal Wars - Final Game
description:
* Please note that the game may not work on Microsoft Edge

Animal Wars is a single player multiplyaer tower defence game created by:

  • Tristan Anderson
  • Onyinye Agetu
  • Jamie Hopkins
  • Doaa Idris

Objective:

  • Defend your base from the waves of enemies with your little bunny minions! If 3 single enemies reach your base it's game over. Survive 20 rounds of enemy spawning to win the game! Order the minions to collect resources farm farms or attack the wolves.

Instructions:

  1. After clicking play, make sure to click on "Enter"  twice to  confirm
  2. Use the WASD keys to move the player
  3. Use I key to order an attack
  4. Use K key to order units to follow
  5. Use L key to order  gathering of resources
  6. Press Enter to confirm
  7. Press Escape to cancel
